isis.stitle: AIR CONDITIONING BASIC THEORY, SYSTEM DIAGNOSIS AND SERVICE (with R-134a Refrigerant System) - SPECIAL TOOLS - RECOVERY/RECYCLING/CHARGING STATION

svcproc.title: RECOVERY/RECYCLING/CHARGING STATION
svcproc.para: The Recovery/Recycling/Charging Station (ZTSE4615) for R-134a is a totally integrated A/C service system, which recovers, recycles, evacuates, and charges R-134a quickly and accurately (refer to Figure 55).

figure.caption: Figure 55. Recovery/Recycling and Charging Station, ZTSE4615

svcproc.para: With its built-in manifold, all A/C service work is done with one hookup. The unit is programmed at its panel-mounted keypad. Computerized controls and solenoids precisely monitor evacuation and charging time. It is designed to automatically shut off after the recovery cycle. A moisture indicator will change from yellow to green when recycling is complete.
